f_template.body: <launch> <include file="$(find temoto_action_assistant)/launch/action_assistant.launch"> <arg name="ta_path" value="$(find $(arg temoto_ws_name))/../actions/" /> <arg name="ft_path" value="$(find temoto_action_assistant)/" /> <arg name="du_path" value="$(find temoto_action_assistant)/resources/default_umrf.json" /> </include> </launch>
